alert.note: Alert for Aransas Islands; Calhoun Islands; Kleberg Islands; Nueces Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 02 at 1:13AM CDT until October 02 at 6:00AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING... ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, minor coastal flooding. For the High Rip Current Risk, dangerous rip currents. * WHERE...Islands of Aransas, Kleberg, Nueces and Calhoun Counties. * WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, until 6 AM CDT early this morning. For the High Rip Current Risk, until 7 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. Rip currents can sweep even the most experienced swimmers away from shore into deeper water. These rip currents can become life-threatening to anyone entering the surf.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.

area.areaDesc: Aransas Islands; Calhoun Islands; Kleberg Islands; Nueces Islands
